title: When i opneed up league and logged in, it said i reached m5 with karma
body: i haven't played any karma games today so im afraid i could be being hacked(probably not) but i checked my match history and saw 0 karma games, is this just a mastery delay or somethin?

replies.body: I do see you have mastery 5 on Karma, but that was quite a bit ago.  It may have been a delayed notification from the updated client.  I don't see anything that could suggest suspicious activity, but you can always [reset your password](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) just to be safe.  Let me know if that clears things up!
